name: Strawberries
properties: Rich in vitamin C and antioxidants
benefits: Strawberries are recommended as an optimized fresh fruit choice for weight loss. They activate AMPK, which boosts cellular metabolism and fat burning. Their high water content and low calorie density make them particularly satiating. Fresh strawberries provide more orosensory stimulation than dried fruit, helping to slow eating rate and increase satiety.
amount: Use as fresh fruit in breakfast dishes, replace dried fruit
